test.name: TC001 Open Form

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Travel Insurance Inquiry'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: เปิดเว็บไซต์และตรวจสอบการแสดงแบบฟอร์ม

test.name: TC002 Valid Input

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.msg: Typing text 'Sodsai Sandee' into text field 'id=contactperson'.
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text '*Please enter your destination.'.
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text '*Please enter a valid email address.'.
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.

kw.name: Page Should Not Contain
kw.msg: Current page does not contain text '*Please enter a valid phone number, e.g., 081-234-5678, 081 234 5678, or 081.234.5678.'.
kw.doc: Verifies the current page does not contain ``text``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: ทดสอบเมื่อกรอกข้อมูลครบทุกช่องถูกต้อง และตรวจสอบว่าไม่มีข้อความแสดงข้อผิดพลาด

test.name: TC003 Empty Destination

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text

kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Page should have contained text '*Please enter your destination.' but did not.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: ทดสอบเมื่อไม่กรอกข้อมูลช่อง Destination และตรวจสอบข้อความแสดงข้อผิดพลาด
test.status: Page should have contained text '*Please enter your destination.' but did not.
